testsuite.name: E2E_ProductCheckoutJourney
testsuite.system-out:
Scenario: Product Order checkout journey
Step 1: Verify Home screen
Step 2: Verify Header banner icons in home screen
Step 3: Enter Product Type in search field
Step 4: Verify product catalog details
Step 5: Verify Product Variant Info
Step 6: Return the Product details from Product List screen
Step 7: Select the first Product from list
Step 8: Verify toolbar title in Product Detail screen
Step 9: Verify the Product details in Product Detail screen
Step 10: Select product quantity
Step 11: Return the selected Product Quantity
Step 12: Click Add To Shopping Bag button
Step 13: Navigate back to Home screen
Step 14: Verify the cart item badge count
Step 15: Verify Shopping cart title
Step 16: Verify Product details in Shopping cart screen
Step 17: Verify and Select Remove button
Step 18: Verify Remove alert popup
Step 19: Select Yes button to remove all products from cart
Step 20: Verify Empty cart message
